Welcome back, Dachande!

::Shredder::

Shredder groans, opening his eyes. He was back in the Sulaco. How he
got there, or what had happened every since he had left, he didn't
remember. Getting up, he sees Magmatron.

"What happened?" he asks, rubbing his head.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., t882hcc91@y... wrote:
> Magmatron:
> 
>      The same opening that had allow Magmatron to leave this galaxy 
> also allowed him to return. He was back in the Sulaco, it looked the 
> same as when he left it. Only dustier. Magmatron also had a new body. 
> The great head of the black TM2 allosaurus poked it's way through the 
> portal. Then the rest stepped through. He transformed to his new 
> robot mode, he looked somewhat like a cross between TM2 Megatron (the 
> allosaur tail on the back of the head) and Tigerhawk (allosaur head 
> on his shoulder)
>      "SLAG!!" He roared. He typed in a few button and the autoguns 
> came online, breaking away all the rock that had once surrounded the 
> Sulaco. The rock flew from the ship with a huge force. "Apocalypse, 
> get to the Sulaco, now. I have war to discuss with you."
>      Magmatron paid no heed as Cerberus crawled behind him.
> 
> Cerberus:
> 
>      In his new Techno-organic body he was capable of cloaking, a 
> technology he had copied from Dachande. He crept quickly by 
> Magmatron, the "leader" not even knowing. He got out of the base and 
> headed towards a cave, decloaking as he did.
> 
> 
> Dachande:
> 
>      A transdimensional rift opened and Dachande was thrown out of 
> it. He slammed into the ground hard. He had gotten rid of his cursed 
> beast mode, and the only true way for Magmatron to command him. Now 
> all Dachande wanted to do was find Battera and eliminate Magmatron 
> once and for all.
